content.data: The Wire Basket Material Schedule allows selecting Wire Baskets with different overall sizes for different applications in your Assemblies.
The following Properties are available for Wire Baskets:
ID -  The ID number for the selected Material Schedule.
Name -  The Name of the selected Material Schedule.
Description -  The Description of the selected Material Schedule.

Upcharge -  The "Upcharge" value will only be added in a Rate Table that uses the  Bid Method  " Use Part Catalog Pricing ". This value is a Percentage Upcharge you charge above your Standard Part Catalog Price as entered in the  Part Manager  when this Material Schedule is in use.

The logic built in to Solid will find the optimal size Wire Basket from your Wire Basket Schedule to fit in the Opening that a Wire Basket from the Schedule is placed in. Follow the following steps to setup the Wire Basket Schedule:
First , make sure that the parent (the line that is labeled Wire Baskets) is highlighted.
Next , browse in the Material List to find the Wire Basket you would like to add and click the assign   button.
You can also use drag & drop to add new Wire Basket Materials.
Then , continue adding new Wire Baskets until you have complete coverage for your needs.
